name: Brittany Will
text: We went to the Mellow Mushroom when we were visiting my mom at UVA Hospital. The doors were locked when we arrived. Apparently they are only doing take out during COVID-19. We called the number and ordered 2 pepperoni pizzas and 2 soft ‚Ä¶More

name: Kirsten Vaughan
text: pizza, mmm, very tasty. Got there about one, it wasn't busy. The staff was sociable and attentive.

name: Joe Lopsang
text: Pizza here is fantastic. Try the buffalo chicken. A bit pricey for what you get but all in all great food and I always make a stop here when I am in c-ville.

name: Angelica Leubner
text:
First and foremost, WOW üòÅ
The customer service here is phenomenal, and the pizza and wings are amazing! My family and I will definitely be ordering from here again.
Worth every single penny!

name: The Dub
text: Great place to get some pizza and wings. The oven baked wings were huge and delicious! Pizza was very good as well. Great service.

name: Spencer De Geus
text: We went last week. We ordered wings, meat balls, and 2 different pizzas. Mine was gluten free buffalo chicken. The wings were sub par, needed to be cooked longer. (This is not a chicken wing place so all is forgiven)... they got my pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: S S
text: My fiance and I found this place while visiting C-Ville; we'll be moving to the area and wanted to know where the locals eat. This place was fantastic! The food tasted great and was reasonably priced for a lunch out. They have a lot of ‚Ä¶More

name: Erich Reimer
text: A tasty and spacious craft pizza restaurant as part of The Corner by UVA. They have a good variety of drinks too. Good place to try some quality and interesting pizzas in their well-decorated and surprisingly gigantic facility! From the outside it seems a bit small but inside - wow, it‚Äôs massive!

name: Rebecca Saul-Williams
text: Great fast friendly service! The food was very fresh!

name: Tom Harris
text: Still amazing pizza, can't wait to sit inside and have a beer again.

name: Brenda P
text: Cute place with lots of character. The appetizers were very tasty even tho they went skimpy on the wings. Pizza tasted awesome!!

name: Jennifer Patterson
text: Good crust and interesting toppings for their pizzas.  Good place to take a group of people.  Family friendly.  Has seating outside during nice weather.  No dedicated parking and on street.parking can be hard to find.  Good thing that there is a parking garage on the corner behind the restaurant. Gluten free and vegan options!

name: William Ngu
text: Pizza is so great. Service is good. Not much to complain about.

name: Terrie Phippins
text: We are out of town decided to try Mellow mushroom. Got subs they are really delicious. Meatball sub needs more sauce & cheese. Pls Thanks!

name: Tamara Lafferty-Totman
text: Food is decent. I like the eclectic semi 1960s meets 1990s Vibe, but thinking it's time for an update. They have been this style foe a LONG time. Now it seems to have a franchise VIBE that's overdone or out dated. When they first opened I ‚Ä¶More

name: Melissa Martin
text: Comfortable, cozy atmosphere. Calm environment. Pizza was hand crafted and they have so many different toppings, sauce and cheese options!

name: Matthew Deweese
text: Visited here for a birthday with a larger crowd with children and had a great meal and a great time. They made space for us at two tables and we were served quickly. We all had appetizers and full meals which all came out in a timely ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Shamroski
text: Great pizza, horrible for take out because of parking.

name: T Cochran
text: Holy shiitake pizza was awesome!  The wait staff was quick, friendly, and helpful when asked questions about menu. The atmosphere is funky fun, college town with UVA in the house TVs around so sports watching was easy here. Lively, good eats I would recommend.

name: Kayla Morrison
text: Love the food it was extremely  delicious   the staff was great  I definitely  recommend this plas the mighty meaty pizza and meatball hoggie are my favorites  along with the delicious  triple chocolate  brownies  and the hot melting chocolate  chip cookie  prices are reasonable

name: Ian James
text: The ingredients are always fresh, and you can tell the difference. If they mess up any part of your order they will go over and beyond to fix any mistakes that were made. I make sure to stop in any time I'm in the area because it is just ‚Ä¶More

name: Elizabeth B.
text: Love this pizza! Hot, fresh, fast, delicious! Service is great and fast. Love their devote, matches the name! Will definitely go back and the others to try.

name: venkatramanan rao
text: Good food! Good ambiance! Liked the place. Will visit again!

name: Patti KS
text: I always love Mellow Mushroom. This is my forth one. They are consistently good and fun and reasonably priced. And they have vegan options!

name: Shawnti Edwards
text: Love love this place, their mary jane brownie is delicious!

name: Bonnie Armstrong
text: Loved the pizza it has become my new favorite.

name: Monkey Worship
text:
Oh. My. God. This place was amazing. I would definintly recommend it for a college student, or even tourists visiting this beautiful town.
The waitress was very nice and kind to me and my family, providing everything we ‚Ä¶More

name: Craig Perkinson
text: It was delicious. Waitstaff was friendly.

name: michael clatterbuck
text: The greatest of the pizza chains.  The whole wheat crust is Devine.  Mellow mushroom pizza is delectable.

name: ronnie davenport
text: Outstanding food and service. Only complaint is cardboard straw and screaming kids...

name: Lara Jacobsen
text: Always have loved their pizza since we moved here in 2006 and the selections. The salads are exceptional too!!

name: Emmet Costen
text: In my opinion the best pizza in Charlottesville. The crust is amazing, pizzas are unique and tasty!

name: Pam Hiner
text: We usually go to the mellow mushroom after work from UVA. We realize it‚Äôs late, 11:30pm, but we usually only get drinks. This past Friday night we met up with some friends, there was seven of the us. Other then the gentlemen at the bar, we ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Harper
text: Awesome pizza near UVa campus. So many choices. I had buffalo chicken this time.

name: karl helmstetter
text: Good pizza, good service, they let us eat outside (we had our dog), even though it was freezing!  Pizza was tasty, dough was unique, like a whole wheat, without the added texture.   Kids LOVED watching the cooks spin and make the pizzas. ‚Ä¶More

name: Elaine Hall
text: Had lunch on their patio yesterday with my dog. The service was excellent! The young ladies immediately brought a bowl of water for the dog. We had a Karma pizza which was delicious.

name: Alex R
text: Having always heard of mellow, I finally got a chance to enjoy it. Went for the meats and my date the white with shrooms. Both pies were great, perfectly cooked and the small size had is full after 2 slices. Will be returning to the shroom

name: Clay Goldman
text: Admittedly, I had high expectations coming in.  When I was younger, my family lived by a Mellow Mushroom and I loved going there.  Then we moved away and I‚Äôve been craving it ever since. ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Siler
text: Hard to beat tasty pizza (small enough for one), awesome IPAs and a killer greek salad

name: Colleen Delawder
text: Pretty decent pizza. The pretzel sauce was very watery, though.

name: zoey Bradner
text: This place has the best food.  Loved it...

name: Jakob Hancock
text: It was good, definitely hip, and full of energy. I wasn't sure what to think of the portraits of our founding fathers dressed in gangster-like attire, but nonetheless it was comical. Open late at night, and defiantly a go to place when near UVA, traffic however is a hoot. Not an easy "pop in" kinda place.

name: Sarah Mines
text: Service was terrible and the food was worse!

name: Sahil Desai
text: Excellent food.

name: Susan Rose
text: Great food, nice art. But the parking is very difficult

name: Amanda Walsh
text: The pizza was üî•üî•üî• I like that the store is vintage Mellow!

name: Guy Holstein
text: Great food and service, awesome atmosphere!

name: Madie Crank
text: We had an enjoyable lunch. I decided to try their new pizza in the menu while my boyfriend ordered a large cheese pizza with mushrooms. Everything was prepared fresh and was tasty. The service was good too. Will definitely visit this place again in the near future.

name: Brianne Heisel
text: Get the Kosmic Karma! Love everything here. Great beer selection, great vibe, plenty of TVs to catch sports on.

name: Elizabeth Evans
text: We recently had our unofficial after party (following our wedding reception) at the Mellow Mushroom in Charlottesville, VA.  The food was, as always, AMAZING!!!  We pre-ordered, and it was ready for us as soon as we arrived.  Our guests, ‚Ä¶More

name: Wendy McCarthy
text: Great pizza, relaxed atmosphere!

name: Benjamin Raske
text: This is a great mellow. Pizza is really excellent, and of course giant. Great beer selection. The kids menu has really good mac and cheese.

name: Mrinmoy Das
text: Always a good place to visit for good food. This one is a bit crowded though in school time. But the food is good. Worth the wait.

name: Juliana Allen
text: Excellent food and family friendly atmosphere

name: Denise Coon
text: Great service. Delicious pizza!!!

name: Lindsey Wilkin
text: Spent last Wednesday night here with some friends for Trivia Night. Wednesday night has a $14 pitcher for select beers‚Äî they really know how to cater to their college audience! Plus, we got 3 for free based on different accomplishments in trivia.

name: Dave Diamond
text: We were very disappointed this afternoon when we visited. We were seated promptly and then proceeded to wait more than 10 minutes while no one ever came to take our order. The most frustrating aspect of this experience was that there were ‚Ä¶More

name: Erik M
text: Incredible pizza,great selection of beer.  I make sure to stop there everytime I visit Charlottesville!

name: William Bears
text: The pizza here is quite good.  For the competitive trivia here is strictly worse than the one at Hardywood.  They allow groups of any size, which may make it more fun for a casual night out.  Pint night is also an excellent draw to this ‚Ä¶More

name: John Carter
text: The food is delicious, but I'm disappointed with how much space they had. I would have liked to see an easier way to make a reservation. However, I'll keep coming here for the vegan pizza!

name: Aditya Sarkar
text: Fantastic pizza place, probably one of the best in Charlottesville! The pizzas seem expensive, but they're really big, one large pie is definitely enough to feed 3-4 people. They're really nice about substituting topics if you're picky. ‚Ä¶More

name: Laura Schroeder
text: The service here is super friendly and efficient,  even when they're extremely busy...and the pizzas are incredible! Amazing flavors,  fresh ingredients, and the most exciting selection of toppings anywhere, especially for a vegetarian.

name: Daniel Roberson
text: Food was good and fairly quick, considering how busy they were. They left out one of our pizzas, which took another 10 minutes to arrive, but they immediately comped it with an apology. Great experience overall.

name: David Manvell
text: Extremely good pizza!

name: Anshuman Suri
text: Service is a bit slow, but the ambience and food is quite good

name: Steve Horton
text: We love Mellow Mushroom, and everywhere we go and find one, we eat there.  Great pizza, calzones, and service.

name: William Cabot-Bryans
text: Very tasty pizza. Wish the crust was a tad thicker in the middle. I appreciate the thick crust edge, but a little more thickness in the middle would support the heavy toppings better.

name: Michael Clark
text: Nice little place to take your family to eat.

name: Heather Shu
text: Great salad and wait staff. Pizza yummy too!

name: Jama Macpherson
text: We returned to eat at the same place where we had two years ago. The pizzas were delicious as were then. The atmosphere is very pleasant And the prices are reasonable.

name: Catherine Dunne
text: Fabulous pizza, I hope I find an excuse to come back soon. The pretzels looked way better online though.

name: Nate Linebarger
text: They didn't give me drugs like I inferred from the sign but the pizza was very good

name: Rohil Bhinge
text: Great service and great pizza!

name: Alvin Ago
text: Great food and service. Staff is very attentive. Truly top top notch!! There is a reason why they've been around all these years. AAA+++!!!

name: Jonathan Harar
text: Greek salad with a cheese slice is an awesome lunch special.  I like the pizza here with a ton of artichokes.  Also their baked wings are really good too if pizza is not up in your rotation.

name: Brooke Stebick
text: If you want the best pizza in the world, you need to stop reading this and get yourself to Mellow Mushroom. We have never been disappointed in any of the locations we've visited and this one is no exception! The service was great, the food ‚Ä¶More

name: Nicole Harris
text: Awesome place!  This is absolutely the best place that I have experienced in charlottesville!  The amotsphere is wonderful,  so calming and vibrant at the same time.  The service was great wasn't demanding,  impatient,  or rude!  Answered ‚Ä¶More

name: Patriot 84
text: Says they deliver but told us 2.6 Miles was to far away, so if your not on campus you have to deal with finding parking which isn‚Äôt possible. Now to the pizza, it was ok at best we had buffalo chicken pizza and it had maybe 5 small pieces ‚Ä¶More

name: Tech Support
text: Food was passable.  Waitress was pleasant but just seemed absent minded.  Told her 3 different times what I wanted.  Maybe it's me,  but I'm an attention to detail type of person.  Because of the bad experience,  I won't be going back to any of their restaurants.

name: Daniel Brooks
text: Atmosphere is cooler than the pizza. But overall pretty good.

name: Daniel Milligan
text: Pizza was very good.  Service was fast.  Overall a great experience.

name: John Moore
text: Can't really go wrong with any of the pizzas here.  Best pizza on the corner, even though it's a chain.

name: Dylan Davis
text: First time eating here and first time eating pizza dough pretzels. The atmosphere was themed almost at the same level of a rainforest caf√©, but with mushrooms and I really enjoyed that. Everything from the salad to the subs were delicious and I look forward to coming back here!

name: Linda Miller
text: Kind of pricey. Pizza here was so so. Definitely a yuppy, college town atmosphere.

name: Tianyu Zhang
text: The pizza is just amazing!

name: lauren silveira
text: Pizza and wings were amazing. The mushroom soup is soooo good too! We got the holy shitake pizza. If you love mushrooms this is the pizza for you. Definitely will be coming back üôÇ

name: Tanner Holland
text: My girlfriend and I arrived 15 minutes before the kitchen closed at 11 (three hours before the bar) so we ordered very quickly. Our waitress did not give us good recommendations and rushed to get our order in, which was understandable. She ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Telford
text: Very good service right away,  food was excellent and good quantity for the price. Will definitely recommend and return when ever I go to Uva hospital .

name: JT MWG
text: Delicious and good service. Nice environment.

name: Jeremy Hawthorne
text: Family friendly and affordable.

name: Jenn Uber
text: Their pizza is Delicious! They have Great lunch specials and quick service! They have outdoor seating, which is really nice to enjoy on the warmer days. Plus, they offer UVa employees a nice discount on Thursdays! Definitely work checking out any day of the work for lunch or dinner though! :-D

name: Rebecca Wright
text: The food at any Mellow is always good. I've never had a bad meal. Usually the service lives up to the same standard. Not true with my visit here. We rarely saw our waitress. She brought the check without ever once refilling our glasses, ‚Ä¶More

name: Margaret Mack
text: Best place I've been! Nice atmosphere, nicest waitresses, they care. Vegetarian options. Fast service, the food is absolutely delicious! The food is so filling. Good spot to hangout as well

name: Dennis Robinson
text: Better pizza than your average pizza joint. Good atmosphere to grab a bite and a beer. It was very crowded when I visited, and the staff did its best to manage the flow of traffic. Mellow Mushroom has vegan cheese and large beer selection. I knocked it down a star because I felt the food and beer was pricey for what I got.

name: Ra Hobby
text: Very noisy but it's Saturday night and full of UVA students.  Excellent experience.

name: gimmeafreeknusername
text: Food is great, atmosphere cool. Too expensive for what u get though....and I'm a foodie so I'm not cheap. Also, you're going to have to circle the block about 6 times to find parking and then pay for it anyway.

name: Michael Coffey
text: Awesome Friendly service and original pizzas and subs are the best I've ever had. Skip Pizza Hut, Dominos, and get Mellow

name: Chasity Harris
text: Great food. Clean and friendly service

name: Jordan Elizabeth
text: Super super yummy food. Decent prices and the atmosphere is nice and calm. The interior is very creatively decorated and fits the name!

name: Will Nelson
text: Wonderful pizza! The service is also usually exceptional. They also offer a lot of gluten free options, so the whole family can eat here.

name: Danielle Hartka
text: Food was delicious! Casual atmosphere,  great for young kids.

name: Dora Nelson
text: Awesome food. My daughter ordered a vegan pizza and loved it. We've enjoyed this place for 12 years now. Highly recommended!

name: Dan Hare
text: Went there for a wedding after-hours and it was great. Treated us well and served us nice drinks as we waited for them to spin up the grills for excellent pizza. Great stuff

name: John LeMasney
text: Mellow Mushroom is one of the places that reminds me of my former home in Princeton, NJ. Truly soft crust, made with time and reason. Delicious sauces and toppings worthy of either coast. Dough used to its own best intents, like the amazing ‚Ä¶More

name: Jack Pazin
text: Awesome pizza

name: Catherine Im
text: We got the House special pizza, size large, and split it between three hungry college kids. We also subbed out the olives for some shiitake mushrooms, and I've never been happier with mushrooms on my pizza.

name: Heather Gottshall
text: They consistently make good pizza!

name: Misty Rose
text: Great food, friendly staff, and a nice place to sit and relax while enjoying the food. Staff at the hospital recommended this place and I was not disappointed. My 14 year old son also enjoyed the food and the decorations. We plan on going back next time we are in town.

name: Riley Pena
text: Beer was amazing. Great location. Food was good. I removed a star because our waitress brought us an incorrect pizza, initially denied it when it was delivered, and did not correct it once it was noted on the bill. We happily paid but will not likely be returning. We much prefer and recommend Lampo Neapolitan Pizzeria.

name: Warren Holy
text: Good food, relaxed atmosphere

name: Virgil Wallace
text: Good pizza- will be ordering take out from now on, though.

name: Ludy Perez
text: Went to visit my niece and when to grab a bit to eat. We decided on Mellow Mushroom and it was awesome. Love the theme and the food was excellent. Also the staff was amazing. I'm from Puerto Rico and i will be recommending. Chef Ludy

name: Jack Clauser
text: Great weird pizza

name: Josh Kranenburg
text: Pizza was very good, but I am pretty sure I was double charged for items including cheese. Also 6 dollars for avocado is insane.

name: J Channel
text: Overall a good experience with excellent pizza and friendly staff, however the A/C wasn't working and I ended up waiting longer than expected once seated.

name: Janel Moore
text: Great pizza and subs.

name: Mike Byerly
text: Pizza was excellent. If your young and looking for a crowd of to drink with this is THE PLACE!! They have pint night 3$ any beer.

name: Mrbjvb
text: Love the pizza here! Other things on the menu look good - but just can't get past the pizza. Good selection of craft beer on tap!

name: Dave Cheney
text: Great pizza at a good price

name: Yolanda Gonzalez
text: Pretty good pizza and nice atmosphere.

name: Adrienne Allen
text: I had a friendly, attentive server, and my build-your-own pizza (I chose kalamata olives, applewood smoked bacon, and avocado - winning combo!) came out prompt and delicious. Highly recommend if you find yourself near UVA!

name: N.C. Miller
text: Ordered from Mellow Mushroom today. Was told the order would be delivered between 12:15-12:30 only to call at 12:35 to be told the order hadn't even been taken out and it would be 15 more minutes making the wait time over 1 hour. Got the ‚Ä¶More

name: Sean Cooper
text: I don't care for pizza but this place was pretty good

name: LaQuinn Gilmore
text: It'd be nice to see some entertainment like LaQuinn. He's rising and gives good shows to be a rapper.

name: Matt Houtsma
text: Great pizza and good drink specials

name: Perry Rexroad
text: Ordered pepperoni and mushrooms pizza went to pick it up was on top oven 5 other pizzas on top of it was only pepperoni so they threw some mushrooms on grill and put on top of my cold pizza and tried to pay everybody was confused who had ‚Ä¶More

name: KeeHong Lee
text: Very neat place with the great taste.

name: Steven Bromley
text:
This was a great pizza shop...it‚Äôs where the locals go...the environment was hip and trendy...but fine with taste.
I tried three different pizzas while I was here...and each of them were so ‚Ä¶More

name: Sharie Cabral
text: You usually have a line to wait in, but it is definitely worth the wait.  The staff there is always very friendly no matter how busy they are.

name: Anonymous Hippopotamus
text: Five Stars for the pizza, actually!...which may explain why I've had difficulty a couple times finding a closer parking space (the only reason I knocked off 1 star) They have a great selection of local and out-of-state craft beer on tap, ‚Ä¶More

name: Laura Crenshaw
text: Very good food and service

name: Melissa Murphy
text: I know this is famous for pizza but the salads are awesome as well !

name: galen palowitch
text: One of my favorite restaurants on the Corner!

name: Theresa Anderson
text: We got subs, they were real good, better than subway!

name: Andrew Davis
text: Great pizza. Great staff. Nice atmosphere!

name: Mariel
text: Worst FOOD POISONING of my life, couldn‚Äôt get a refund or even a manager to speak with me. Supposedly the manager left EXACTLY at 10 when the kitchen closes. Wouldn‚Äôt throw a salad together at 10:02 for a gluten free customer who waited 15 minutes for either of 2 bartenders to take notice.

name: Sophia
text: Great food. They are known for the pizzas but salads and sides are also very good. Great service. Good for groups. Recommended.

name: Kurt Peterson
text: I loved Mellow Mushroom when I had one nearby in college at App State, and the Cville version didn't disappoint. Not as many hippies, but the pies are delicious and the bar has a bounty of good taps to satisfy most any beer drinking. Tip: show up when it's raining for cheap beer pours.

name: Gail Chassevent
text: Sorry to say the grill needed cleaning and much of the charcoal ended up in my food. The waitress did apologize but didn't offer a solution.

name: Sean Case
text: Lots of great food options here. The pizza as well as the calzones taste delicious. The decor and service is usually top notch as well. This is becoming a more well known chain due to the quality it delivers.

name: Rene Verry
text: Vegan delight for pizza and calzones.

name: Alexandra Ptucha
text: Great server and fast awesome pizza. Fyi if you go on a rainy day you get $1 off drafts

name: shari rood
text: Awesome pizza, awesome service. Love the Kosmic Karma.

name: Andrew Taylor
text: Great food and relaxing atmosphere! There are tables inside and out. Weather was really nice and we ate outside with great service and food! Great JOB MM!

name: Penny Geiger
text: Food & service excellent as usual.  Love going here to eat while visiting grandson. It has always been his favorite.

name: Kyle Moler
text: PIzza is great, service is great, delivery is the only reason they get 4/5 stars. Just dont expect them to deliver and you'll be pleased.

name: Heather Maezono
text: Pizza was really good and the service was great.

name: Dr Chike
text: Wonderful environment and food

name: Phyllis Gibert
text: Wonderful food, great service, and welcoming atmosphere.

name: martha orange
text: Okay. Some people love their pizza, it's not my kind of pizza - thick crust not unique. Good drinks menu. Usually crowded especially football game days. BRUSCHETTA IS AMAZING. Good spot to stop for a quick meal near the corner.

name: Roger Lindsey
text: We ordered pizza here last night. My wife and I both agreed it made our top 3 pizzas of all time. We had the ‚ÄúHoly Shitake‚Äù, it was PHENOMENAL!  Service was great, pricing was good. It will be on our return to list next time we come within a hundred miles of Charlottesville.

name: Eric Henderson
text: Really good pizza! We had the load baked potato pizza. AMAZING!

name: Susan Clark
text: The pizza was delicious

name: Brian McIntyre
text: Great Service! 500 stars

name: Lisa T
text: Fast service pleasant waitstaff...

name: Brenda Davis
text: Great service good food

name: Faith Anne
text: If you are not from Charlottesville, check to make sure you are not trying to get in while there is a UVA game. We made that mistake. We waited until the game was over and it cleared out quickly. The food was delicious and came quickly. We definitely recommend if you enjoy good pizza!

name: Syed Ali
text: Great food with gluten free options!

name: Sherrie Brown
text: I've never had a bed experience at any Mellow Mushroom. Very consistent. This location is generally packed when students are in session.

name: Jeff Watts-Roy
text: Always a good pizza!  And who knew they had Hendricks gin!

name: Aaron Moore
text: One of the best places to get a pizza.  The wheat crust is amazing.  I also recommend the salads. The spinach salad is exceptionally good.

name: matthew han
text: Pizza is pretty good, although Lampo is still my favorite pizza joint in Charlottesville. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ezra Wise
text: Yummy.  Soup and salad were on point.  Service could've been a tad better, but adjust expectations for a college town setting and you'll be fine üòÄ

name: David Kessler
text: This place makes outstanding pizza.  The decor is really colorful and fun.  If you only get pizza once while in Charlottesville make it here.

name: Hannah Hein
text: Great pizza, just time it right. It's a very popular spot for students, so it you want a quiet family meal, just time it right. Other than that, great food, good options for all dietary needs.

name: Jamaal Roberts
text: Had the Stuffed mushroom, mushroom soup and the Mega Veggie Pizza. All of the food was good too. My waitress was very good and attentive. Great Place Great Atmosphere. Will definitely go again. However its like 3+ hrs from where I live. ‚Ä¶More

name: Felicia Lewis
text: The food was excellent. I enjoyed the atmosphere. I will definitely be back.

name: Sarah Smithers
text: Great food and an awesome selection of beers!

name: Phil Morgan
text: Good food, friendly staff.

name: Chris Kelm
text: Trivia night can be a madhouse, but otherwise you'll be able to find a good time here. They have a pretty good selection of regional brews and other drinks. Their pizza dough is what makes their pies delicious

name: Ryan Petersen
text: OMG I wish this place was near home. We ate here while skiing Wintergreen. Can't wait till our next ski trip. Will definitely make this a tradition.

name: Mel Counts
text: Really good!

name: C. C.
text: Always delicious & fresh...Can't beat their calzones! Wait staff is usually attentive & helpful.

name: Barbara Black
text: Best Holy Shitake pizza experienced  in this location as compared to other locations

name: ArunKumar Subramaniam
text: One of the best pizzas in Charlottesville. They also have good vegetarian options. Try not to miss 'holy shitake'. It is the best pizza in the shop. And it's vegetarian ;)

name: Mary Hutt
text: The. Kosmic Karma is an amazing Pizza Wings no words can describe how delicious Steak and cheese sub delicious if you likr mayo ask for more !! Beer cold. Serve GREAT

name: Essence Thompson
text: Always a great experience. I always forget how good the pizza is until I stop in again.

name: Eric W
text: Great service and fantastic pizza. Haven't had a bad experience at any Mellow Mushroom.

name: Sherry McCarty
text: Delicious and great service every time!

name: Mary Greene
text: One of my favorites!  Fantastic food with a fun and casual atmosphere.  Great service.

name: Seth VandeBraak
text: Best pizza on grounds and is always full of flavor.  Would recommend the "Mighty Meat" or "Pacific Rim"

name: Chip Dodd
text: Killer gluten free selection.

name: Ally L
text: Oh my god the pizza is sooo good! The loaded baked potato pizza is a must try! The beer selection is very good but geared toward IPA and othe pale beers. The Ginger beer was the best I've had. The psychedelic decor was fun and not overwhelming. I'd give this place 10 stars if I could.

name: Sharon Easter
text: Waitress was great. Noisy but fun

name: Skyler Stoddart
text: Always hits the spot. Best beers at REASONABLE PRICES!!!! Also not ever too busy so fast and friendly, dependable service and quality. 10/10

name: Sarah Simmons
text: Great pizza! Nice thin crust and great selection of toppings.

name: Donna Lindemann
text: Good  food reasonably priced

name: Carey Mayne
text: Great spot, great food, fast service. Will definitely be back.

name: Ed Testerman
text: Food wasn't very good, it was cold, and very dry even the sauce. The waitress was awesome and very friendly. She did a great job.

name: N Frances
text: Great staff. Super friendly and helpful. Amazing beer menu. The pizza was good.

name: Dustin Lape
text: Great food and beer. Helpful staff. It's worth going just for the experience. The walls are covered in hilarious trippy themes and the dishes are all unique

name: Jeffrey Robinson
text: Great tasting Pizza even a guy from NYC enjoyed!

name: Nate Hellmuth
text: I love this place. The crust here is amazing and always is a good choice to eat here.

name: Candy Grierson

name: Kristina
text: Best pizza ever!!

name: Lenny Li
text: The normal pizzas are alright but the specialty pizzas are great!

name: Lauren
text: Love this place. Only reason I give it 4 stars is becuase it is a little pricey for pizza. Would suggest the kosmic karma pizza becuase it is out of this world. They also have vegan options which is nice.

name: Alaina Gimbert
text: Very much a college scene but great beer selection and pizza. Vegan cheese available.

name: Lynn
text: AMAZING pizza! Great prices! Great service! Probably my new favorite pizza spot.

name: Janita Chupp
text: Great food and service.

name: Neal Morgan
text: Typical of the franchise, the pizza is delicious slightly thick hand-tossed style wheat crust. Great selection of pizza varieties and beers.  AVOID Trivia night is overly loud  and the 10 questions oscillate between impossible and elementary school level. Good drink special nights.

name: Jeff Morrill
text: Loved the service and the vegetarian options (including a non-dairy cheese selection).  Perfect place for a big group of diverse appetites.

name: Misty Cheek-Radford
text: Great salads and pizza. Wait time for food was long for lunch time.

name: Patrick Wilkinson
text: Delicious Caesar salad with grilled chicken in Charlottesville . Excellent service. Highly recommended.

name: Jeffrey Geraci
text: Cosmic karma was delicious and gluten free! Need more local brews. Wings were ok, not great. Spinach salad was superb. Service was mediocre.

name: Kylie Kirby
text: Love love love the pizza here and friendly staff! One of my favorite places to eat!

name: Michael Plummer
text: Stopped in for lunch, was not disappointed. Food was excellent, service was just as good.

name: Nathan Peters
text: Okay food. A little expensive and pretty greasy. Service is very slow for a fast food place so don't go if you're in a hurry. I think there are better chicken joints out there.

name: RWHedgePhotography, LLC
text: Wow. That is some good pizza! Also good apps and drink selection. Beer on tap in great variety. Atmosphere and seating is awesome

name: Travis Dean

name: David

name: Erich Allen

name: Don Mateo
text: This used to be the best pizza in Virginia. Then their crust got way worse and their cheese started to smell like feet. Now it's not even top-3 in Charlottesville. But if they keep putting knicknacks on the walls and selling t-shirts, maybe nobody will notice.
